name: Invaders Hunter
description:
Hello Fellows, thank you all for visiting my page.

The game is still under development but we are hoping it will be released this month, so stay tuned fellows and I would be more happier if you can test out the game and give the feedback and the next update we will make sure we include a browser but at the moment you have to download  downloadable file.

The invaders hunter is the top down shooter game. In this type of game you have to shoot as many invaders space jets as you can without you getting killed.

Game Controls

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

LEFT or RIGHT arrowsTo move the space jet Left or Right refers to the x-axisUP or DOWN arrowsTo move the space jet Up or Down refers to the y-axisLEFT MOUSE BUTTONTo fire (Single Gun)E Button & LEFT MOUSE BUTTONTo engage the side guns, but make sure you have enough side guns bullets for you to be able to use the side guns. Note: The side guns are self equipped so there is no pick ups for them. Use left button to fire.U ButtonTo disengage the side gunsSPACE ButtonLong press to fire the missiles.  Note: The missiles are self equipped so there is no pick ups for them. Use space button to fire missiles.ESCAPE/ESC  ButtonTo pause the gameP  ButtonTo resume the game

PS/LIGHT WAVE/UCOM    ETC   GAME PAD CONTROLLERS

PS CONTROLS

LEFT or RIGHT Buttons/ANALOGUETo move the space jet Left or Right refers to the x-axisUP or DOWN Buttons/ANALOGUETo move the space jet Up or Down refers to the y-axisTRIANGLE ButtonTo fire (Single Gun)SQUARE/BOX ButtonTo engage the side guns, but make sure you have enough side guns bullets for you to be able to use the side guns. Note: The side guns are self equipped so there is no pick ups for them. Use triangle button to fire.X ButtonTo disengage the side gunsCIRCLE ButtonLong press to fire the missiles.  Note: The missiles are self equipped so there is no pick ups for them. Use circle button to fire missiles.SELECT ButtonTo pause the gameSTART ButtonTo resume the game
